policies.involuntary_refund:
- If flight is canceled, agents may process the refund directly in the GDS.
- If the new flight is affected by >3 hours, no waiver is required; add ENDO note (e.g., INV REF 2J flt#/date-cxl).
- Refunds may be chosen instead of rebooking.
- In practice, long delays (e.g., â‰¥5 hours) or strike-related cancellations may also qualify when documented.
policies.involuntary_reissue:
- For involuntary schedule changes:
  - If the passenger accepts the new flight, agents can reissue without penalty.
  - Must include in ENDO Box: INVOL SKCHG
  - No waiver required.
  - Handled directly in the GDS.
policies.voluntary_refund:
- Standard fare rules apply for voluntary refunds.
- Some ticket classes may be non-refundable.
- Refunds, when permitted, are returned to the original form of payment.
policies.name_change:
- Minor spelling corrections may be allowed.
- Full name changes are not permitted.
- Otherwise handle via refund (per fare rules) and rebook with the correct name.
policies.group_booking:
- Available for groups of 10+ passengers.
- Discounts and flexible payment terms may be offered.
- Booking via airline support or agency partners.
- Name changes and other terms follow group travel rules.
policies.baggage_policy:
- Liability for loss/delay/damage is limited under the Warsaw Convention.
- Damage must be reported immediately or within 7 days; delay claims within 21 days of delivery.
- Higher value may be declared with a supplemental fee; fragile/valuable/perishable items may be excluded.
policies.seat_request_policy:
- Extra-legroom seat upgrades available for a fee.
- No business class cabin.
- Upgrades can be done during web check-in or at the airport counter; subject to availability.
policies.short_term_cancellation_policy:
- No published same-day/24-hour void policy.
- The right to transport becomes null and void for no-shows; cancel segments before departure to preserve value.
- All changes must comply with fare rules and ticket conditions.
